entry.string: The Paypal IPN module will provide an instant payment notification for Xaraya in the event that someone has purchased something and paid through Paypal. The module itself only notifies any other module that are hooked to it based on a create hook that an event has happened. It is up to the individual modules themselves to track whether the event was correct as in payment price, etc. This is a utility module to be used with multiple modules as a pass through for collecting payment information.
entry.translation: Zee Peypel IPN mudoole-a veell prufeede-a un instunt peyment nuteefficeshun fur Xereya in zee ifent thet sumeune-a hes poorchesed sumetheeng und peeed thruoogh Peypel. Zee mudoole-a itselff oonly nuteeffies uny oozeer mudoole-a thet ere-a huuked tu it besed oon a creete-a huuk thet un ifent hes heppened. Bork bork bork! It is up tu zee indeefidooel mudooles zeemselfes tu treck vhezeer zee ifent ves currect es in peyment preece-a, itc. Thees is a uteelity mudoole-a tu be-a used veet moolteeple-a mudooles es a pess thruoogh fur cullecteeng peyment inffurmeshun.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a.

entry.string: "Modify Configuration". From this menu option, you can update the necessary configuration options, such as your whether to send you an email on receipt or to test the module before going live on a production basis.
entry.translation: "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun". Frum thees menoo oopshun, yuoo cun updete-a zee necessery cunffeegooreshun oopshuns, sooch es yuoor vhezeer tu send yuoo un imeeel oon receeept oor tu test zee mudoole-a beffure-a gueeng leefe-a oon a prudoocshun besees. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: There are no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The Paypal IPN module will send a create hook throughout the system to notify other modules that an event has happened. Check your hook configuration if problems exists on notification.
entry.translation: Zee Peypel IPN mudoole-a veell send a creete-a huuk thruooghuoot zee system tu nuteeffy oozeer mudooles thet un ifent hes heppened. Bork bork bork! Check yuoor huuk cunffeegooreshun iff prublems ixeests oon nuteefficeshun.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
